channel.title: Partyhat Model Help [PI]

item.title: Partyhat Model Help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

I think you used the itemid of a dreadfull pouch. I suggest you change it to an hat you don’t use and just change the color ids (search on googlr for custom model coloring or something)

Hope i helped

Read full topic

item.title: Partyhat Model Help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @iBunnie iBunnie
item.description:
@iBunnie wrote:

[quote=“nardoscape, post:1, topic:473369”]I know this should be wicked easy, but I’m running into issues… anyway heres a picture of the issue:

2012-12-14_2158_zpse2796092.png761×498

If you rightclick on the item, it says “lime partyhat” does not appear that way. Anyway heres my int

case 12044: itemDef.itemActions = new String[5]; itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wear"; itemDef.editedModelColor = new int[1]; itemDef.newModelColor = new int[1]; itemDef.editedModelColor[0] = 17350; itemDef.newModelColor[0] = 926; itemDef.modelid = 2635; itemDef.modelZoom = 440; itemDef.modelRotationY = 76; itemDef.modelRotationX = 1850; itemDef.anInt204 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset1 = 1; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 0; itemDef.anInt165 = 187; itemDef.anInt200 = 363; itemDef.anInt188 = -1; itemDef.anInt164 = -1; itemDef.anInt175 = -1; itemDef.anInt197 = -1; itemDef.name = "Lime partyhat"; itemDef.description = "It's a Lime partyhat."; break; [/quote]
Mess around with color id’s

Read full topic

item.title: Partyhat Model Help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @nardoscape nardoscape
item.description:
@nardoscape wrote:

I know this should be wicked easy, but I’m running into issues… anyway heres a picture of the issue:

2012-12-14_2158_zpse2796092.png761×498

If you rightclick on the item, it says “lime partyhat” does not appear that way. Anyway heres my int

case 12044:
itemDef.itemActions = new String[5];
itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wear";
itemDef.editedModelColor = new int[1];
itemDef.newModelColor = new int[1];
itemDef.editedModelColor[0] = 17350;
itemDef.newModelColor[0] = 926;
itemDef.modelid = 2635;
itemDef.modelZoom = 440;
itemDef.modelRotationY = 76;
itemDef.modelRotationX = 1850;
itemDef.anInt204 = 0;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = 1;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = 0;
itemDef.anInt165 = 187;
itemDef.anInt200 = 363;
itemDef.anInt188 = -1;
itemDef.anInt164 = -1;
itemDef.anInt175 = -1;
itemDef.anInt197 = -1;
itemDef.name = "Lime partyhat";
itemDef.description = "It's a Lime partyhat.";
break;

Read full topic
